definition: Sino-Italian
to take one's fancy/to be to one's liking
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate
not to one's liking

sentences.english: He loved challenges, marveled at new technology, and loved to tinker.
sentences.chinese: 他熱愛挑戰，中意於新技術的研發，喜歡修理行業。

sentences.english: I would like to make friends with my goddess you so desirably .
sentences.chinese: 我希望那麼中意地做有我的女神的朋友您。

sentences.english: I don't mind scruffy, but a lady with a sense of what suits her.
sentences.chinese: 我不介意獨憔悴，但她中意的一位女士用更好的理解。

sentences.english: I do not see anything I really like in the menu.
sentences.chinese: 菜單上寫的我一個也不中意。

sentences.english: Chang Wen - Jie will personally selected choice to the three private collections and use.
sentences.chinese: 尚雯婕會親自挑選最中意的三套私人珍藏並使用。

sentences.english: In fact, I seldom go shopping. I prefer library and home to shopping mall.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我平時中意某系圖書館同屋企多過去行街。

sentences.english: In fact, the capital of Mali, Bamako, means "place of the crocodiles" in the Bambara language.
sentences.chinese: 首都巴馬科在班巴拉語中意指鱷魚之地。

sentences.english: Miho as I like to wear gold and white clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我和金子美穗一樣都中意穿白色嘅衫。

sentences.english: I love sports very much. I am the master-sportsman in my school.
sentences.chinese: 我非常中意體育運動，我還是學校的體育健將呢。

sentences.english: "Triple-Romania letter" in Malay and Italy as "Singapore.
sentences.chinese: “信訶補羅”在馬來文中意爲“獅城”。

sentences.english: President Napolitano will also attend the celebration to mark the 40th anniversary of the establishment of China-Italy diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 納波利塔諾總統還將出席中意建交40週年慶祝活動。

sentences.english: Both sides reached extensive consensuses on jointly pushing forward China-Italy all-round strategic partnership.
sentences.chinese: 雙方就共同推進中意全面戰略伙伴關係達成廣泛共識。

sentences.english: he could tell that she had feelings for him and he had feelings for her.
sentences.chinese: 他能看得出她對他有感覺，而他也很中意她。

sentences.english: I would like reading instead of sitting without anything to do.
sentences.chinese: 我中意讀書而不願意閒坐着。

sentences.english: Once a desirable variety has been discovered, it is perpetuated by grafting or budding.
sentences.chinese: 一旦發現了中意的品種，它通過嫁接或發芽永存。

sentences.english: That is the reason why he dislikes me.
sentences.chinese: 這就是他不中意我的原因。

definition: to admire
to treasure/to be very fond of
to choose/to select
to carry on a shoulder pole/to choose/to pick/to nitpick
to raise/to dig up/to poke/to prick/to incite/to stir up
to have a preference for/to fancy/to choose after consideration/to settle on
to be interested
suitable/fitting/appropriate
heartbeat/heart rate/(fig.) emotionally affected/aroused (of desire, emotion, interest etc)
to find to one's taste/to pick (after looking at)/Taiwan pr. [xiang4 zhong4]
to fall in love/to love sb or sth dearly (lover, or art)
to be moved/to be tempted
to be partial towards sth/to favor/to prefer/preference/favorite
to be willing to do sth/to be ready to do sth/to be happy to do sth/content/satisfied
favorite
to one's taste/tasty/fig. sth one enjoys
picky/fussy
